website_summaries.verdict: For kids who love to make things "go", this is a great play set that also includes some learning elements.
pros: This play garage includes 7 track pieces that can connect to other sets and a tow truck
Set has 9 SmartPoint locations that play music, say phrases, and help teach colors and letter when a Smart Wheels vehicle rolls over them
Go up the elevator, down the exit ramp, or park in a parking spot
cons: Additional cars that will interact with the SmartPoint locations must be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: VTech for the win!
customer_reviews.text: My 15-month old son, my 5-yr old daughter, and even my 9-year old son are all busy with this VTech garage! It’s adorable and works nicely. Took me a while to put together but it was worth it. We also purchased additional VTech go go smart cars to use with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Cute - Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is educational but a lot of fun. My 22 month old grandson is going to love love love this. I did buy additional cars since it only comes with one car. I also purchased the VTech Go Go Smart Friends Shimmering Seashell Castle for my 22 month old granddaughter. It is great as well, but only came with one character. I bought additional characters. I purchased this for their birthdays in December, but will probably give it to them before then. They are going to love these. Additional sets can be purchased that can be connected.
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: My seven year old daughter did enjoy it, but she’s got the motor control to ...
customer_reviews.text: I can only think a large number of the positive reviews are professional, because the design of this toy is so completely flimsy. It’s frustrating for my young son, constantly falling apart to the point where he ignores it completely. My seven year old daughter did enjoy it, but she’s got the motor control to be delicate enough not to make it fall apart. The age range it’s for just doesn’t. Every other Vtech toy we’ve had has been much sturdier, so I was really surprised this one didn’t live up the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves these!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for my 2yo grandson! He loves it and I love that it's easy to put together, and the price was right! There is actually a volume switch so if you don't want the loud noises, you don't have to have them! We also got him the car wash and 2 extra cars (each set came with 1 car). They are all interchangeable so it's great.
customer_reviews.author: jenna4m

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Track doesn't stay together. Track isn't continuous so cars have to be lifted off and then back on again. Weird design. We threw the track out because it was nothing but pieces all over the house ALL. THE. TIME.
customer_reviews.author: AmyO

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy for toddler
customer_reviews.text: If your kiddo likes cars this is great! My almost 2 year old has been playing with it non-stop. It comes with an interactive car, has songs and talks too.
customer_reviews.author: Pazzolupo

customer_reviews.title: Fun for many ages, wish it was sturdier
customer_reviews.text: My kids range 8m to 20m, both enjoy the cars but only my 20m can use the rest as expected. I’ve bought two different setups and I had to keep certain parts off because they wouldn’t stay on there own. The pieces come apart easily so I constantly have to put it back together for my 20m. I only wish it was sturdier and more toddler proof.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Esteller

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandbaby is two and loves all the features on the track. My only complaint is that the legs supporting the track are flimsy. Plastic legs are too thin. But over all satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: shari wolf

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy
customer_reviews.text: ok so mine came with a couple pieces a bit warped, it took a couple months before the pieces got used to the position they’re supposed to be in, the red ramp going from third to second story used to pop out but anyway now it doesn’t so it’s ok. Also the green support beams still don’t lay flush to the ground but ultimately my 1 yo LOVES the tow truck and sings along with it lol. He enjoys moving it around in the garage and am hoping it’s a toy that he’ll continue to grow into. I’m planning on getting more vtech go go vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun toy. My 18 month old got it for Christmas but my 4 year old also enjoys playing with it. It isnt too terribly noisy itself. There is a volume control button. However the cars that come with it are very loud with no volume control. They sing obnoxious songs too. My only complaint is there is not a lot of track included to attach this to another set. Other than that it has been a lot of fun! Its very colorful and visually appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Great first car track.
customer_reviews.text: 2.5 YO loves these. Fairly easy for him to put together (we have additional track pieces) so he can kind of build his own road to nowhere. Due to the thickness of the track most cars work on this (MatchBox, Hot Wheels, larger cars, etc). I would pass on the actual vtech cars. They are loud and obnoxious. It is neat how they interact with the raised areas of the track.
customer_reviews.author: Itsme

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful toy set!!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old received this from grandparents for Christmas and it is too cute!! We did buy the additional 3 cars to add to it and even the cars light up and sing songs! This toy is totally underrated, I can't believe I had to go through several pages before I came across it. I would 100% recommend this toy!
customer_reviews.author: blleo

customer_reviews.title: so I've ordered extra vehicles and the helicopter (and at an excellent price, by the way
customer_reviews.text: I can hardly wait for Christmas so I can help my grandson play with it. It only comes with the tow truck, so I've ordered extra vehicles and the helicopter (and at an excellent price, by the way, for such a great learning toy!), and will try to resist the temptation to order all the other sets before his birthday in February. I did take it all out of the box to make sure it works. ;-) Yes, it's a little loud, but it's so much fun to play with!!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Educational and fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my god son's first birthday. His parents loved it, the grandparents loved it even his older sister loved it. this is a gift that I see both of them playing with for years to come! VTech has proved the test of time over the last 20 years. while pricey at times you end up with your moneys worth in the long run!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: I'd recommend spending a little more to get the extra road pieces to connect to this set. My two kids (3,6) love this and play for hours on the tracks. It's got light and sound and the whole thing stands up well to a little roughness too, which is important.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy for an inquisitive two year old
customer_reviews.text: My two year old LOVES it! While it did take a bit of time to assemble and put the stickers on, it was worth it to see his face light up when he first saw it. Great toy, and one I'd suggest for toddlers just learning to engage in pretend play.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Few things to keep in mind before buying...
customer_reviews.text: Overall kiddos like playing with the garage. Couple of concerns I have: if you have carpet, the "road" pieces do not like to stay together. On a hardwood floor it does fine. Top signs are easy to pip off so be careful. And lastly, not all stickers comes on product so you'll need to take some time to stick them all on (tedious).
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not super durable
customer_reviews.text: My kids enjoy playing with this, but it would be nice for there to be a complete track that they could push the cars around. I also wish the material was just a bit more sturdy. My son enjoys “smashing” things and within a day, the tracks were bent and warped to the point that the cars didn’t move down the track properly. You can sort of bend it back and get it to work ok. The lights and sounds work great and the kids still enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: awiste

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 16 month old twin boys. Absolutely LOVE this toy and I highly recommend it! The track and the cars are durable! It's been sat on, dropped, elevator misused, taken apart.....and there has been no breakage. I definitely recommend getting extra VTech cars....although the boys put other cars on the track and seem to enjoy that just as much. An hour of self guided imagination by 2 active boys!
customer_reviews.author: Anne K. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this. It is a little too easy to disassemble and not as easy to reassemble. My son is putting all his toy cars and marbles down it. It comes with some pieces that can be moved around to other locations to keep it changing.
customer_reviews.author: S. cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 2.5year old nephew for Christmas gift he loved it very easy for him to put together/take apart the cars that go on track make noise and light up and are also big enough to make playtime even more enjoyable
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart often
customer_reviews.text: This toy falls apart almost every time my son uses it. He’s 17 months so not gentle but it’s rated for 1+. The red and yellow ramps fall off and the car elevator has even come loose from the side. I find myself putting it back together constantly. If it stayed together better, this would be a great toy. He loves to put the cars down the ramps, play the music and park the cars. I wish it were more stable and required less maintenance on my part. It was hard enough to put it together the first time!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! It stays together
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It stays together, it's easy to assemble and our 2 year old grandson loves it. His parents leave it up and he plays with it during different parts of the day. He likes the music and the lights as it responds to his actions and it keeps him occupied in a good way. This was definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Horrible instructions but kids will love it
customer_reviews.text: While my son totally loves this toy, I wasn't too pleased. I found the instructions difficult to follow and just ended up looking at the picture on the box for help putting it together. Also, it's not very sturdy and some of the pieces don't snap in and easily come off.
customer_reviews.author: Pandorica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sturdy build, hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My two year old son loves this. We have bought him several of the cars that go along with it. It is well constructed of sturdy plastic. It can be picked up and moved in it's entirety. It is easily 'operated' by 18+ months old children.
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can buy additional cars and track pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 10 month old for Christmas. He loves to stand up to it and push the buttons. I love that I can buy additional cars and track pieces as he gets older and will use it for more than sitting on top of it (it's sturdy!) and pushing the buttons :) Super cute set that I think we will get lots of use out of for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: TKT

customer_reviews.title: comes apart fast
customer_reviews.text: my little guy is a normal destructive guy and it didn't take him long to take this apart after I put it all together. I tried to use gorilla glue to keep it in one piece but that didn't work. We decided to put this in storage until he is older (he's almost 3)
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sonnenberg

customer_reviews.title: This garage is a great addition to the Smart Wheels collection
customer_reviews.text: This garage is a great addition to the Smart Wheels collection. We purchased this for my son and it connects well with his other set. The tow truck has a catchy tune, but can be switched on or off. While this set is fun on it's own, if you do not have more sets, you might consider purchasing an extra set of tracks for the car to be moved around on.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: So many addons available!
customer_reviews.text: My 2yr old nephew LOVED this. Down side is assembly, no instructions provided so had to use the box as a visual to assemble! Also only 1 car is provided so I had to buy more- which adds to the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart before it's even able to be used
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return this item as it does not work well at all. The garage elevator does not stay attached to the other part at all. This may end up going right in the garbage before we can even use it. Unfortunately I cannot return it as we don't have the original box it came in. Also hate that you have to place stickers on there. My 2.5 year old is just as angry at this screwed up design as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: A Great Play set for the 3-5 year old group. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our then two year old grandson. He's now three and continues to play with it every time he's at our home. He also has two other V-tech playsets that he uses in conjunction with this set. We made sure he had extra cars and trucks from the same line. He loves pretending, spending hours on end. I think it's money well spent. Putting it together took about an hour. Not difficult, instructions were clear, just have some patience.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kutruff

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent - great toy for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: Such a great toy for the money, would be nice if it included atleast one more car but you can buy them separately.... My 2 year old loves it. Cars are so cute and the whole set up is neat. I like it integrates with the other products from this line from v-tech! Money well spent ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 2yo loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this. I bought some extra tracks on amazon for about $15 and some used cars on eBay. I think my son will be reconfiguring the tracks himself in a year or two if it’s still around.
customer_reviews.author: Snodgrass McFluffinstuff

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this thing is so adorable. Son loves it. Definitely durable, my son has put it through the ringer and it's still holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't a good fit for a 2 year old.
customer_reviews.text: 2year old had no interest in it but I think it was quite a nice toy. Just need a kid a bit more "creative" to play with it as there's not much to it.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: Good fun and learning for the kids
customer_reviews.text: The cars great and the kids love it. Only one issue I had was that one of the plastic pieces were melted at the connection point. So the piec does stay on as it should. Overall great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: This whole line of cars and tracks are great. My son loves them. The only thing I'd consider dinging them for is how well the track peices stay together, which is not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Veeeerrrry sturdy product. Was my sons favourite Xmas gift by far. Even the car that comes with it makes noise and lights uplease and is still working.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good toy great price. Stickers not in English
customer_reviews.text: My toddler and his 7year old brother are already loving it and I just put it together . I love that it's interactive and has lots of activities included . However the stickers that go on the track did not come in English. It's some other language that I don't recognize. Would have been a 5 star if the stickers were in English. My 7 year old is mad that he can't read them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Turner

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Do you enjoy constantly re-attaching plastic parts? If so, buy this! Otherwise, run.
customer_reviews.author: Daymonium

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Buy with extra track and cars
customer_reviews.text: Fun set! My son plays with this daily. I recommend purchasing the pack of extra track to extend it, as well as a couple of extra cars.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: very durable
customer_reviews.text: I am a daycare provider and this stands up amazingly against toddlers. Normally they break the toys in minutes but this product doesnt
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson for his 3rd birthday all the children up to age 7 enjoyed playing with it. A month later still playing with it number one toy.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Neel

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: This garage is great! It has three levels and the car elevator is easy for the kids to move up and down on their own! It does have a lot of pieces but its pretty easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a toddler, but expect to reassemble it constantly
customer_reviews.text: It's well designed with plenty of moving parts and fun sounds. My two year old boy loves this thing. Unfortunately a part of his enjoyment is tearing it apart. The pieces come apart very easily, so you better get used to snapping the tracks back into place.
customer_reviews.author: Chris House

customer_reviews.title: Good entertainment for kids
customer_reviews.text: These V-tech toys keep my 3 year old son quite occupied/engaged/entertained. He never gets sick of playing with them, there is a lot of sensory stuff going on for him - all the cars talk and make sounds, the set makes sounds, there are moving parts etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: The BEST toy of the holiday season
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing toy I have had the pleasure in gifting to a young child. I bought it for a nephew's son and will be purchasing it for my grandson. When he saw it all he wanted was to play with it. Perfect for a wide range of age.
customer_reviews.author: Little Lady Gardener

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: My Grand kids love this they have hours of fun playing with it .
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting toy
customer_reviews.text: My kids (3 and 1) are playing it everyday. Nice long lasting toy. We also bought the smart people doll house to connect to it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Sound switch shorted, electric buzzing
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together, but after two times playing the sound switch shorted out, andnow all the sound effects are a high-pitch, electrical buzzing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: I love that this has extensions
customer_reviews.text: I love that this has extensions. We have been adding to it. It's pretty sturdy too. My toddler has wailed on it and even sat on it once and it's still intact. Well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Okay. It keeps coming apart. My 1 year old have most fun with the cars alone on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Latoyamarie Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toy. Has a few different activity spots and my 18 month old is entertained by it. I do suggest buying more of the cars to go with it as it only comes with one! Fun toy and it hooks up with the other vtech similar car tracks
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Fun interactive toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun interactive toy. The car recognizes where it’s at by the marked spaces. My son absolutely loves this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Bright and fun garage
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old got this for Christmas and is enjoying playing with it. It was a bit of a pain to put together and comes a part a lot which is why I gave it a 4 instead of a 5. The colors are very bright and he does like it. It was also bigger than I expected and I put it on his train table and it covers the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer GAgnon

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with miscellaneous VTech cars!
customer_reviews.text: Put it together on my own and wasn’t too difficult like most kids toys! My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Olson

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little smaller than I expected. I was disappointed when we put it together.
customer_reviews.author: I guess

customer_reviews.title: My 15-month old loves cars, and he loves this ...
customer_reviews.text: My 15-month old loves cars, and he loves this. He also loves taking the pieces apart that can move (ramp, etc). He doesn't quite 'get' most of the imagination elements, but I know that will come. He likes putting cars on top of the ramps and watching them zoom down (he claps, it must be very exciting).
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Durand

customer_reviews.title: which is really nice.
customer_reviews.text: A few of the pieces have a hard time staying on, but my son absolutely loves this toy. It's not overly loud, as kids toys go. The tracks are wide enough to fit other toy cars he already had, which is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy..I will be buying more in the future
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to assemble(24 pieces) but was very nice and much larger than I expected. Only downfall was that I bought it for my 16 month old grandson and all he wants to do is take it apart. He loves the cars though!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Stebbins

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old great nephew as a Christmas gift and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yea it’s pretty dang flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Yea it’s pretty dang flimsy. Idk why they couldn’t have come up w something better for our flinstone kids to bang on lol
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Robust enough for a hands on toddler. Hours of playing with it. Trying all features. Had to be strong enough for handling mistakes by him. Always playing with it and the Fire station that we bought separately first. They now work together well with the track between.
customer_reviews.author: Blanker

customer_reviews.title: Best for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: It was nice but We were disappointed that it didn’t have any cars with remotes. it Looks nice though. Works better for very young kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids love playing with this toy. Only came with one car, but we had more and ordered some here as well. My only complaint is that the pieces come off very easily. My 1 year old pulls some of the pieces off without trying. But such is life with a 1 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Katey Stukenholtz

customer_reviews.title: This was a very nice addition to my son's VTech collection
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice addition to my son's VTech collection. It's well made, it's fun and entertaining. The tow truck it comes with is a nice bonus as well. My son just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: StArt

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Very innovative and excellent educational toys. All the bright colors, sounds, and different moving parts are very entertaining for my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Austin C.E.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Grandson obsessed with this. Very durable and fun for the 3yr old
customer_reviews.author: Colleen in Murfreesboro

customer_reviews.title: Kid likes it, not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My two and a half year old grandson loves it. It is not quite sturdy enough for hard play
customer_reviews.author: JustTim

customer_reviews.title: Great value and a great toy
customer_reviews.text: My two year old son and 4 year old daughter both love this set!! They love the size of the cars in their little hands and they actually play together with it for a change! Actually bigger than I pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Roscher

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!! You wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: Great great toy. Worth every penny. My son cant stop playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael and Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying more of these sets.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loves this and the train set. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible pretty sure I got someones return
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed ! I believe I have a returned item all the parts look bent doesn't go together right and missing pieces
customer_reviews.author: cunz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter at 1 1/2+ years old loves the Smart Wheels outfit. Bigger than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. My kids enjoy use this as a platform for other cars and toys. Connects nicely with other go go smart wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Rg S

customer_reviews.title: Nice and fun.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves it. Although he plays with the elevator most.
customer_reviews.author: jimegandreu

customer_reviews.title: Pieces snap on easily and the instructions are very easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: My two and a half year old loves this. He has a another set from this company. We were able to attach it to create a bigger set. Pieces snap on easily and the instructions are very easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: saritaisabellevegas

customer_reviews.title: Noisy fun!
customer_reviews.text: 2 year old grandson loves this noisy thing! Thankfully you can turn off the little noisemakers/vehicles. You can purchase extra cars and tracks as well. Very cool interactive toy.
customer_reviews.author: marlene dance

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not the best toy. Maybe my 1 year old was too rough for this product but kept on falling apart. Also the little truck it came with wasn’t the easiest to slide down the tracks and the garage. Not the best choice for a toy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are officially the best grandparents EVER!! Our grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Z.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality is horrible. Plastic is super flimsy, elevator constantly falling off. Nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly B Stallings

customer_reviews.title: I ma a huge Fan of the VTech Smart wheels and so is he
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 1/2 year old. I ma a huge Fan of the VTech Smart wheels and so is he. Arrived early which was a great surprise. Car comes with battery but the track doesn't just to let you know, Its a fun toy with fun songs and engages my son to learn and play. Its a fun toy for all of us. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my Godson. Loves it. Wish there were more than one car that came with it. Overall, great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Returning because the elevator part was broken. The whole thing wasn’t very sturdy. Parts kept coming undone. Getting something else instead.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Fun with flaws
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fun but a number of flaws. 1 it doesn't break down completely 2. No way to get to the garage lift 3 you really need to get another set of connectors 4. Love these toys and I will get more pieces
customer_reviews.author: P. Ann McEvoy

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 year old son and he loves it!! It is made of cheap plastic and I am sure it will not hold up to a 3 year old boy! Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: The product is really flimsy. It comes apart and bends way too easily for a child’s toy. It was a Christmas present so can’t send it back. Love the Vtech cars though. Just wish the garage was better built.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTIAN A DAVEY

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old son LOVES this set. He loves to play with the elevator with the crank wheel at the top especially.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was the "wow" gift for my 18 month old this Christmas. He loves it! Very interactive and he loves the elevator section
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old adores this. It is also very durable
customer_reviews.author: Shiba

customer_reviews.title: Love the sounds
customer_reviews.text: Cute product. Love the sounds. Entertains the little one for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.text: It only comes with one car and it has a million little pieces to put together.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly wasn't horrible, and he really does enjoy running his cars ...
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old is obsessed with this! Assembly wasn't horrible, and he really does enjoy running his cars / trucks/ helicopters, etc through this. The smart wheels system is great!
customer_reviews.author: Ann P

customer_reviews.title: Good play kit for todler
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year old grandson loves this set. He plays with it a lot, sometimes with other cars and trains. Allows inventive play. So far it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: This thing is big and was a huge hit with the toddlers wish it came with more cars but it was still a great gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Sfreeborn7

customer_reviews.title: Fun for days and days!
customer_reviews.text: This set is one of my son's favorites. It plays a lot of fun songs for him to dance to while he drives his Tommy the Tow Truck around!
customer_reviews.author: August

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with similar sets by manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Gift for grandson! Parents thrilled as it connects to other toys by same manufacturer!

product_meta.title: VTech Go! Go! Smart Wheels Park and Learn Deluxe Garage
product_meta.description:
Style:Standard PackagingPlaytime with miles of learning! Park, play and explore on three stories of interactive learning fun with Tommy and his tow truck at the Go! Go! Smart Wheels Park and Learn Deluxe Garage by VTech. Learn about colors, the rules of the road and play fun sing-along songs and melodies by pressing the three light-up buttons. Roll the SmartPoint tow truck over nine SmartPoint locations to hear different phrases, music or fun sound effects. Press the toy tow truck’s light-up button to hear three sing-along songs and learn the letter T and the name of the vehicle. Build motor skills by placing the tow truck in the elevator and turning the helicopter pad to raise the elevator to any floor on the toy garage. The elevator recognizes each floor with fun sounds and phrases. Use the seven included track pieces to connect to other Go! Go! Smart Wheels and Go! Go! Smart Animals playsets (each sold separately) to encourage creativity. Features durable design, automatic shut-off and volume control. Playset requires 2 AA batteries (not included). Tow Truck requires 2 AAA batteries (batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use). Assembly required. Intended for ages 1 to 5 years.

BRAND STORY
By VTech
feature_bullets: Enhance your child's creativity with Go! Go! Smart Wheels toddler toys; kids build their own interactive toy car garage and race vehicles around for maximum fun
Roll SmartPoint Tow Truck over 9 SmartPoint locations to hear different phrases, music or fun sound effects; includes 7 interchangeable track pieces

Press the toy tow truck's light-up button to hear 3 sing-along songs and learn the letter T and vehicle name; ages 1 to 5 years. Interactive role play features like pressing the light-up buttons, turning the helicopter pad to raise and lower the elevator and other fun manipulative elements build motor skills
Enhance and expand play with connectable Go! Go! Smart Wheels and Go! Go! Smart Animals playsets and collectible figures; all vehicles and playsets work together

Garage requires 2 AA batteries (not included); tow truck requires 2 AAA batteries (batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use). Product Dimensions: 26. 2 x 29. 6 x 17. 8 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars584 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
